title: President Donald J. Trump Is Working To Protect Students From Sexual Misconduct And Restore Fairness And Due Process To Our Campuses – The White House
content:
Fact Sheets			

		Education	

Issued on:
May 6, 2020
With today’s action and every action to come, the Trump administration will fight for America’s students.
						President Donald J. Trump					TAKING HISTORIC ACTION: President Donald J. Trump is ensuring that all students are safe to learn and achieve without facing sexual harassment and sexual assault in our Nation’s schools.
